aka: Singapore Sling: O Ánthropos pou Agápise éna Ptóma

writer.name: 尼科斯·尼克莱迪斯 Nikos Nikolaidis

director.name: 尼科斯·尼克莱迪斯 Nikos Nikolaidis

this_title: Singapore Sling: Ο Άνθρωπος που Αγάπησε ένα Πτώμα
trans_title: Singapore Sling: O Ánthropos pou Agápise éna Ptóma
introduction: Singapore Sling is chasing after Laura, a romantic memory from his past. One night he finds himself in a mysterious villa, watching two women bury a body. He falls into their trap and, in an atmosphere of isolation and decadence, the trio act out insane pleasure games and a ritual of blood and murder.
foreign_title: Singapore Sling: Ο Άνθρωπος που Αγάπησε ένα Πτώμα
